caption: Relating to the authority of the attorney general to acquire by eminent domain certain real property owned by aliens or foreign entities.
summary: This bill authorizes Texas Attorney General to seize real property owned by non-US citizens or foreign entities through eminent domain if the property is used illegally or poses risks to critical infrastructure. This affects all foreign nationals including Chinese citizens/entities owning property near 16 categories of critical infrastructure (energy, communications, manufacturing, etc.). The seized property will be managed by Texas General Land Office.
translation: 该法案授权德克萨斯州总检察长通过征用权没收非美国公民或外国实体拥有的房地产，如果该房产被非法使用或对关键基础设施构成风险。这影响所有外国公民，包括在16类关键基础设施（能源、通信、制造等）附近拥有房产的中国公民/实体。被征用的房产将由德克萨斯州土地管理局管理。
